Verses: 1 naangal Siraippattuppona Irubaththaindhaam Varushaththin Aarambaththil Mudhalaam Maadham Paththaanthedhiyaagiya Andre Karththarudaiya Kai Enmel Amarndhadhu, Avar Ennai Avvidaththukkuk Konduponaar; Appozhudhu Nagaram Azhikkappattup Padhinaalu Varushamaayitru.
2 dhevadharisanangalil Avar Ennai Isravel Dhesaththukkuk Kondupoi, Ennai Magaa Uyaramaana Oru Malaiyinmel Niruththinaar; Adhinmel Therkaaga Oru Nagaram Kattiyirukkiradhupol Kaanappattadhu.
3 avar Ennai Ange Konduponaar; Idho, Ange Oru Purushan Irundhaar; Avarudaiya Thotram Vengalamaayirundhadhu; Avar Kaiyil Sanarkayirum Oru Alavukolumirundhadhu; Avar Vaasalile Nindraar.

4 andhap Purushan Ennai Nokki: Manupuththirane, Nee Kannaarappaarththu, Kaadhaarak Kettu, Naan Unakkuk Kaanbippadhellaavatrin Melum Un Manadhai Vai; Naan Unakku Avaigalaik Kaanbikkumpadi Nee Inge Konduvarappattaai; Nee Kaanbadhaiyellaam Isravel Vamsaththaarukkuth Therivi Endraar.

5 idho, Aalayaththukkup Purambe Sutrilum Oru Madhil Irundhadhu; Andhap Purushan Kaiyile Aarumuzha Neelamaana Oru Alavukol Irundhadhu; Ovvoru Muzhamum Namadhu Kaimuzhaththilum Naaluvirarkadai Adhigamaanadhu; Avar Andha Madhilai Alandhaar; Agalam Oru Kolaagavum Uyaram Oru Kolaagavum Irundhadhu.
6 pinbu Avar Kizhakkumuga Vaasalukku Vandhu, Adhin Padigalinmel Eri, Vaasarpadiyai Oru Kol Agalamaagavum, Maruvaasarpadiyai Orukol Agalamaagavum Alandhaar.
7 ovvoru Araiyum Oru Kol Neelamum Oru Kol Agalamumaayirundhadhu, Araiveedugalukku Naduve Aindhumuzha Idam Vittirundhadhu; Vaasalin Mandabaththaruge Ulvaasarpadi Oru Kolalavaayirundhadhu.
8 vaasalin Mandabaththaiyum Oru Ulle Kolalavaaga Alandhaar.
9 pinbu Vaasalin Mandabaththai Ettumuzhamaagavum, Adhin Thoonaadhaarangalai Irandu Muzhamaagavum Alandhaar; Vaasalin Mandabam Utpuraththilirundhadhu.

10 keezhththisaikkedhiraana Vaasalin Araigal Indhappuraththil Moondrum Andhappuraththil Moondrumaayirundhadhu, Avaigal Moondrukkum Ore Alavum, Indhappuraththilum Andhappuraththilumirundha Thoonaadhaarangalukku Ore Alavum Irundhadhu.
11 pinbu Vaasal Nadaiyin Agalaththaip Paththumuzhamaagavum, Vaasalin Neelaththaip Padhinmoondru Muzhamaagavum Alandhaar.
12 araigalukku Munne Indhappuraththil Oru Muzha Idamum Andhappuraththil Oru Muzha Idamum Irundhadhu; Ovvoru Araiyum Indhappuraththil Aaru Muzhamum Andhappuraththil Aarumuzhamumaayirundhadhu.
13 pinbu Vaasalil Irundha Araiyin Meththaiyinindru Matra Araiyin Meththaimattum Irubaththaindhumuzhamaaga Alandhaar; Kadhavukkuk Kadhavu Neraayirundhadhu.
14 thoonaadhaarangalai Arubadhu Muzhamaaga Alandhaar; Indhath Thoonaadhaarangalin Aruge Sutrilum Munvaasalin Mutram Irundhadhu.
15 pravesa Vaasalin Mugappuththuvakki Utpuravaasal Mandabamugappumattum Aimbadhu Muzhamaayirundhadhu.

16 vaasalukku Utpuramaaga Sutrilumulla Araigalukkum Avaigalin Thoonaadhaarangalukkum Odukkamaana Jannalgal Irundhadhu; Mandabangalilum Appadiye Irundhadhu; Utpuramaai Sutrilum Andha Jannalgalum Thoonaadhaarangalil Siththirikkappatta Pereechchamarangalum Irundhadhu.

17 pinbu Ennai Velippraagaaraththukku Azhaiththukkonduponaar; Ange Araiveedugalum, Praagaaraththin Sutrilum Padhiththa Thalavarisaiyum Irundhadhu; Andhath Thalavarisaiyinmel Muppadhu Araiveedugal Irundhadhu.
18 vaasalukkup Pakkaththilum Vaasalgalin Neelaththukku Edhirilumulla Andhath Thalavarisai Thaazhvaana Thalavarisaiyaayirundhadhu.
19 pinbu Avar Keezhvaasalin Mugappuththuvakki, Utpraagaaraththup Puramugappumattumulla Visaalaththai Alandhaar; Adhu Kizhakkum Vadakkum Noorumuzhamaayirundhadhu.
20 velippraagaaraththukku Aduththa Vadathisaikku Edhiraana Vaasalin Neelaththaiyum Agalaththaiyum Alandhaar.

21 adharku Ippuraththil Moondru Araigalum Appuraththil Moondru Araigalum Irundhadhu; Adhin Thoonaadhaarangalum Adhin Mandabangalum Mudhal Vaasalin Alavukku Sariyaayirundhadhu; Adhin Neelam Aimbadhu Muzhamum, Agalam Irubaththaindhu Muzhamumaayirundhadhu.

22 adhin Jannalgalum, Adhin Mandabangalum, Adhinmel Siththirikkappatta Pereechchamarangalum, Keezhththisaikku Edhiraana Vaasalin Alavukku Sariyaayirundhadhu; Adhil Erugiradharku Ezhu Padigalirundhadhu; Adhin Mandabangal Avaigalukku Munnaaga Irundhadhu.
23 vadathisaiyilum Keezhththisaiyilumulla Ovvoru Vaasalukku Edhiraaga Utpraagaaraththukkum Vaasalgalirundhadhu; Oru Vaasalthuvakki Matra Vaasalmattum Nooru Muzhamaaga Alandhaar.
24 pinbu Ennaith Thenthisaikku Azhaiththukkonduponaar; Ange Thenthisaikku Edhiraana Vaasal Irundha Adhin Thoonaadhaarangalaiyum Adhin Mandabangalaiyum Adharkuriya Alavinpadi Alandhaar.
25 andha Jannalgalukku Sariyaaga Adharkum Adhin Mandabangalukkum Jannalgal Sutrilum Irundhadhu; Neelam Aimbadhumuzhamum Agalam Irubaththaindhu Muzhamumaayirundhadhu.

26 adhil Erugiradharku Ezhu Padigalirundhadhu; Adharku Munbaaga Adhinmandabangalum Irundhadhu, Adhin Thoonaadhaarangalil Siththirikkappatta Pereechchamarangalum Indhap Puraththil Ondrum Andhappuraththil Ondrumaaga Irundhadhu.
27 utpraagaaraththukkum Oru Vaasal Thenthisaikku Edhiraaga Irundhadhu; Thenthisaiyilulla Oru Vaasalthuvakki Matra Vaasalmattum Noorumuzhamaaga Alandhaar.
28 pinbu Avar Therku Vaasalaal Ennai Utpraagaaraththukku Azhaiththukkondupoi, Andha Alavukku Sariyaagath Therku Vaasalaiyum Alandhaar.

29 adhin Araigalum, Adhin Thoonaadhaarangalum, Adhin Mandabangalum, Andha Alavukku Sariyaaga Irundhadhu, Adharkum Adhin Mandabangalukkum Jannalgal Sutrilum Irundhadhu; Neelam Aimbadhu Muzhamum Agalam Irubaththaindhu Muzhamumaayirundhadhu.
30 irubaththaindhu Muzha Neelamum Aindhumuzha Agalamumaana Mandabangal Sutrilum Irundhadhu;
31 adhin Mandabangal Velippraagaaraththil Irundhadhu; Adhin Thoonaadhaarangalil Siththirikkappatta Pereechchamarangalum Irundhadhu; Adhil Erugiradharku Ettuppadigal Irundhadhu.
32 pinbu Avar Keezhththisai Vazhiyaai Ennai Utpraagaaraththukku Azhaiththukkondupoi, Andha Alavukku Sariyaaga Andha Vaasalaiyum Alandhaar.

33 adhin Araigalum Adhin Thoonaadhaarangalum Adhin Mandabangalum Andha Alavugalukku Sariyaaga Irundhadhu; Adharkum Adhin Mandabangalukkum Jannalgal Sutrilum Irundhadhu; Neelam Aimbadhu Muzhamum Agalam Irubaththaindhu Muzhamumaayirundhadhu.

34 adhin Mandabangal Velippraagaaraththil Irundhadhu; Adhin Thoonaadhaarangalil Indhappuraththilum Andhappuraththilum Siththirikkappatta Pereechchamarangalum Irundhadhu; Adhil Erugiradharku Ettup Padigal Irundhadhu.
35 pinbu Avar Ennai Vadakkuvaasalukku Azhaiththukkondupoi, Andha Alavukku Sariyaai Adhin Vaasalai Alandhaar.
36 adhin Araigalum Adhin Thoonaadhaarangalum Adhin Mandabangalum Alakkappattadhu; Adhai Sutri Jannalgalum Irundhadhu; Neelam Aimbadhu Muzhamum Agalam Irubaththaindhu Muzhamumaayirundhadhu.

37 adhin Thoonaadhaarangal Velippraagaaraththil Irundhadhu; Indhap Puraththilum Andhappuraththilum Adhin Thoonaadhaarangalil Pereechchamarangalum Siththirikkappattirundhadhu; Adhil Erugiradharku Ettup Padigal Irundhadhu.
38 adhin Araigalum Adhin Kadhavugalum Vaasalgalin Thoonaadhaarangalukku Arugil Irundhadhu; Ange Thaganapaligalaik Kazhuvuvaargal.

39 vaasalin Mandabaththile Indhappuraththil Irandu Peedangalum Andhappuraththil Irandu Peedangalum Irundhadhu; Avaigalinmel Thaganapaliyaiyum Paavanivaarana Paliyaiyum Kutranivaarana Paliyaiyum Seluththuvaargal.
40 vadakkuvaasalukkul Pravesikkiradharku Erippogira Velippuraththile Irandu Peedangalum, Vaasalin Mandabaththilulla Marupuraththile Irandupeedangalum Irundhadhu.
41 vaasalin Aruge Indhappuraththil Naalu Peedangalum, Andhappuraththil Naalu Peedangalum, Aaga Ettuppeedangal Irundhadhu; Avaigalinmel Paligalai Seluththuvaargal.

42 thaganapalikkuriya Naalu Peedangal Vettina Kallaayirundhadhu; Avaigal Ondrarai Muzha Neelamum, Ondrarai Muzha Agalamum, Oru Muzha Uyaramumaayirundhadhu; Avaigalinmel Thaganapaligalaiyum Matrap Paligalaiyum Seluththugira Aayudhangalai Vaippaargal.
43 naalu Virarkadaiyaana Mulaigal Ulle Sutrilum Varisaiyaai Adikkappattirundhadhu; Seluththum Paligalin Maamsam Peedangalinmel Vaikkappadum.

44 utpraagaaraththile Ulvaasalukkup Purambaaga Sangeedhakkaararin Araiveedugal Irundhadhu; Avaigalil Vadakkuvaasalin Pakkamaaga Irundhavaigal Then Thisaikku Edhiraagavum, Kizhakkuvaasalin Pakkamaaga Irundha Veroru Varisai Vadathisaikku Edhiraagavum Irundhadhu.
45 pinbu Avar Ennai Nokki: Then Thisaikku Edhiraayirukkira Indha Arai Aalayakkaavalaik Kaakkira Aasaariyargaludaiyadhu.

46 vadathisaikku Edhiraayirukkira Araiyo, Palipeedaththin Kaavalaik Kaakkira Aasaariyargaludaiyadhu; Ivargal Leviyin Puththiraril Karththarukku Aaraadhanai Seygiradharkaaga Avaridaththil Serugira Saadhokkin Puththirar Endraar.
47 avar Praagaaraththai Noorumuzha Neelamaagavum Noorumuzha Agalamaagavum Alandhaar, Adhu Sadhuramaayirundhadhu; Palipeedamo Aalayaththukku Munbaaga Irundhadhu.

48 pinbu Avar Ennai Aalaya Mandabaththukku Azhaiththukkondupoi Mandabaththin Thoonaadhaaraththai Indhappuraththil Aindhu Muzhamum Andhappuraththil Aindhu Muzhamumaaga Alandhaar; Vaasalin Agalam Indhappuram Moondrumuzhamum Andhappuram Moondrumuzhamumaayirundhadhu.

49 mandabaththin Neelam Irubadhumuzhamum, Agalam Padhinoru Muzhamumaayirundhadhu; Adharku Erippogira Padigalum Irundhadhu; Thoonaadhaarangalile Indhappuraththil Oru Thoonum Andhappuraththil Oru Thoonum Irundhadhu.
